text: Need Morgan Morris for Cotton On campaign. Budget around $2,683, looking for 1 x Brand photoshoot, 1 x 30-second Instagram reel, 1 x Instagram story, 1 x 15-second TikTok, 2 x LinkedIn post. 7 week exclus from other fashion brands. Campaign runs November 2025. Usage rights for 6 months. Engagement period: 5 months.
